Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Initial Adventures and Underwater Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Human Meteor, his dual identity as Duke, and his initial confrontations, culminating in his involvement in uncovering a Japanese submarine conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Fare to Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor on the comic cover, followed by Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront where he notices he is being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers
The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Rooftop Fight and Hospital Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts 'cop shooters', followed by a hospital visit where he's briefed about a potential Japanese submarine conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Infiltration Gone Wrong
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to use Toby as a stowaway on the yacht to investigate the submarine conspiracy, but Toby is quickly discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Setup and Depth Chart Discovery Leading to Toby's Plight
sub_scenes.description: Scene setting on the yacht, leading to Pete's discovery of the depth chart and Toby being thrown overboard.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Investigation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives underwater, discovers the sunken submarine, encounters divers, and a fight ensues as the submarine crew prepares torpedoes.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Intervention and Yacht Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Namor's sudden appearance and attack on the submarine and ship, followed by Duke's return to the yacht and discovery of Peter's treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Attack on Submarine and Ship
sub_scenes.description: Namor surfaces and attacks both the submarine and the ship, causing damage and casualties.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Return, Depth Map, and Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes underwater conflict, returns to the yacht, searches for and finds the depth map, which reveals Peter's treachery.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

Major_Arcs.title: The Boys, the Bus Garage, and Nazi Spies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows two boys who stumble upon a Nazi spy plot at a bus garage, involving Major Bronson in disguise and a dangerous confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads, Ambulance, and the Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads, followed by a scene with two boys observing an ambulance and finding a dropped wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Bronson's Disguise
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the bus garage, witness a Marine saluting a civilian in disguise who is revealed to be Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised
Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Bronson's Deadly Plan, and Uprising
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, Bronson reveals a deadly plan, and a fight breaks out.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help, Secret Office, and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Boys split up to seek help, Skip discovers a secret office with sabotage plans, and a conspiracy is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Office Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Marine barracks are attacked, leading to a chaotic confrontation inside an office.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Arrival, Major's Injury, and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive and engage in combat, Major gets injured but they ultimately achieve victory over the Nazi spies.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ, El Tigre, and Rosita's Rescue in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry in South America as they get entangled in the kidnapping of Rosita, involving El Tigre and a dramatic rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in a desert setting, followed by their discovery and confrontation in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Introduction and Misguided Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of El Tigre and his men, leading to a forced car ride and a mistaken rescue attempt.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Entering El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Planning the approach to El Tigre's hideout and the infiltration under the cover of darkness.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Diversion, El Tigre Reveal, and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Diversion tactic at El Tigre's hideout, his dramatic reveal, and the subsequent search for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Rescue Mission and Hotel/Citadel Assault
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre learns Rosita is with Axis agents and initiates a rescue mission involving horseback assault, hotel infiltration, and a citadel escape attempt.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Final Confrontations and Government Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Climax of the rescue with individual fights, Rosita's maid's intervention, and the arrival of government troops.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Tragic Justification
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle mission, his capture by natives, and a flashback revealing a tragic event and his vengeful motivations.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle, followed by military reporting about a 'grave matter'.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle by boat, senses danger, and gets ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Torture Threat, and Deal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, brought before Grauer, threatened with torture, and seemingly makes a deal with a foreign agent.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Justification, Flashback, and Vengeance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, a flashback reveals Sam's burning and Dolan's coldness, followed by Grauer's indifference and Dolan's vengeful declaration.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush, Chief's Death, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle ambush, accidental death of the chief, and the resulting alliance with the natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Sam's Fight, and Dolan's Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Captain contemplates surrender, finds Sam fighting, followed by Dolan's disciplinary spanking for disobeying orders.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigate the Banker Murder and Blood Transfusion Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to a sick child and a blood transfusion crisis involving Farnacci.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Confrontation and News Office Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and a city street confrontation, followed by their assignment to investigate the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Visit for Miss Reilly
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins visit the police station to inquire about Guy Reilly, then proceed to the hospital to see his sick daughter, Miss Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Blood Type Crisis and Candy Store Phone Call
sub_scenes.description: Hospital visit reveals Miss Reilly's blood transfusion need and Farnacci's unique blood type, leading to a phone call to Elijah from a candy store.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search, Mrs. Murphy's Revelation, and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Search for Tom Reilly in Irish section, revelation from Mrs. Murphy about Reilly's sacrifice, and a sudden taxi ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice
Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Street Pursuit, Neighborhood Blockade, and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Dan pursues the shooters, aided by Diane and the Irish neighborhood, leading to a street brawl and police intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath, Blood Donation Appeal, and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the shooting with injured being taken to hospital, urgent need for blood donation, community response, and Tom Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation
Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
